comment._content: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/anmm_thecommons] Somebody might know better - I was going by the glimpse of harbour on the left, and the federation-ey woodwork on the picnic shelter seen in this slideshow - www.nationalparks.nsw.gov.au/sydney-harbour-national-park...
